TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GraphicsContainer extends System.MarshalByRefObject

Docs.summary: Represents the internal data of a graphics container. This class is used when saving the state of a object using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.BeginContainer%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.EndContainer%2A> methods. This class cannot be inherited.
